text.greeting.first: Hi, I’m Juke, your AI assistant.
text.greeting.context.all: We’ll focus on the whole content now.
text.input.placeholder: How can Juke AI help you today?
text.input.tip: Use @ to list and mention elements on the page.
text.mode.precise.name: Precise
text.mode.focused.name: Focused
text.mode.balanced.name: Balanced
text.mode.creative.name: Creative
text.error.response.maxTokens: Token limit exceeded. Your prompt lead to pruned response that cannot be parsed.
text.error.response.finishReason: AI service stopped generating response. Reason <{{finishReason}}>
text.error.response.noResponse: No response from the AI service.
text.error.response.safety: AI service stopped generating response due to safety violation.
